layout.name: particle
layout.title: Particle Effect
layout.tooltip: The path to the particle effect to spawn.

layout.name: priority
layout.title: Priority
layout.tooltip: The render priority of this particle effect.

layout.name: prewarm
layout.title: Prewarm
layout.tooltip: Pre-simulate this many seconds of the effect, so that particles can start already spawned.

layout.name: tint
layout.title: Tint
layout.tooltip: A color to tint the particle effect.

layout.name: timescale
layout.title: Time Scale
layout.tooltip: A multiplier for the speed at which the particle effect simulates.

layout.name: nocull
layout.title: Don't Cull
layout.tooltip: When checked, the particle effect will never be despawned.
